about_the_game:
Enter the neon-drenched, high-speed world of Cyberstrike Chronicles, where you play as Azure Stormrider, the ultimate courier tearing through the vertical maze of Neon Spires. In a city where time is money and style is everything, you’ll race against the clock, defy gravity, and deliver high-priority packages with flair.

Master your cybernetic arm as you swing across towering gaps, zip through glowing skyscrapers, wall-run along vertical surfaces, and perform jaw-dropping aerial tricks to impress the city's watchful eyes. Utilize every ounce of agility and ingenuity to find the fastest (and most daring) routes to your destination.

Every second counts as you dodge hazards, navigate intricate delivery zones, and take on increasingly risky contracts to become the most legendary courier in the city. It’s not just about speed—it’s about style. The smoother your traversal, the bigger the rewards.

Are you ready to rise through the ranks, dominate the leaderboards, and make Neon Spires your playground?

Time to swing into action, deliver the goods, and leave your mark.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6006, 2.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700, 3.60 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB

short_description: An arcade free-roam action-adventure traversal game where you navigate through the neon streets of Neon Spires as a daring courier, mastering speed, style, and gravity-defying tricks using your cybernetic arm to deliver high-stakes packages in record time!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
